title: Aa Okkati Adakku
overview: A fantasist, Chitti Babu spurns honest work after an astrologer tells his greatness will come after marriage. He snags the heart of millionaire Royyala Naidu's daughter, Rambha, but the pragmatic Rao sets a royal ransom: one lakh rupees before Chitti Babu touches his queen. The battle lines are drawn: son-in-law's harebrained schemes clash with father-in-law's cunning traps, all while Rambha navigates the chaos with love and exasperation. Will prophecy prevail, or will hard work win the day?
